Intro.aboutMe1: I am Jose Gabriel, I started to study Computer Engineering by a friend and discovered the Web Development by chance with the only class of Web Programming that I saw in the university because the teacher did not attend anymore, since then I enjoy the development of web experiences for users.
Intro.aboutMe2: My greatest achievement is never to give up learning Web Development in a technologically backward country with one of the most difficult conditions to grow in the world of technology.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.description: Here are some of my most recent projects, among them are both personal projects and works done as a freelancer making use of different technologies such as NextJS, Astro or Tailwindcss, among others.

Skills.title: Skills
Skills.description: These are the Frontend and Backend technologies that I currently use to develop all my web applications.
